measurement_conditions: 95th percentile (P95) server-side latency under a load of 100 orders/minute. (Ref: REQ-1-093)
improvement_opportunities: Database query optimization for geospatial searches; Caching vendor availability.
business_relevance: Directly impacts user experience for core actions like search, add to cart, and order placement.

measurement_conditions: On a simulated 4G network connection. (Ref: REQ-1-093)
improvement_opportunities: Code splitting, image optimization, reducing main-thread work.
business_relevance: First impression for Vendors and Admins. Poor LCP leads to frustration and perceived poor quality.
